4091.verse: وَٱلَّذِى|And the one who|133|143|6481$جَآءَ|brought|71|92|4023$بِٱلصِّدْقِ|the truth|99|120|14981$وَصَدَّقَ|and believed|103|124|14607$بِهِۦٓ‌ۙ|in it,|52|72|204$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|102|51$هُمُ|[they]|62|72|56$ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ|(are) the righteous.|151|151|1539$

4092.verse: لَهُم|For them|79|91|98$مَّا|(is) what|80|104|262$يَشَآءُونَ|they wish|96|120|9951$عِندَ|with|56|80|521$رَبِّهِمْ‌ۚ|their Lord.|88|112|54$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|88|28$جَزَآءُ|(is the) reward|119|131|814$ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ|(of) the good-doers|152|152|556$

4093.verse: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ|That Allah will remove|165|173|14982$عَنْهُمْ|from them|87|104|2643$أَسْوَأَ|(the) worst|96|113|14983$ٱلَّذِى|(of) what|83|100|138$عَمِلُواْ|they did|78|95|6052$وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ|and reward them|132|140|14984$أَجْرَهُم|their due|85|108|10136$بِأَحْسَنِ|for (the) best|111|158|10137$ٱلَّذِى|(of) what|83|130|138$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|164|94$يَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|115|912$

4094.verse: أَلَيْسَ|Is not|68|82|5522$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|81|123$بِكَافٍ|sufficient|81|109|14985$عَبْدَهُۥ‌ۖ|(for) His slave?|120|148|11068$وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ|And they threaten you|171|199|14986$بِٱلَّذِينَ|with those|90|104|3498$مِن دُونِهِۦ‌ۚ|besides Him.|116|131|4463$وَمَن|And whoever|106|136|1012$يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ|Allah lets go astray -|160|190|4277$فَمَا|then not|77|107|132$لَهُۥ|for him|65|95|977$مِنْ|any|50|65|53$هَادٍ|guide.|60|60|9349$

4095.verse: وَمَن|And whoever|106|114|1012$يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ|Allah guides,|103|120|7012$فَمَا|then not|77|94|132$لَهُۥ|for him|65|82|977$مِن|any|50|67|53$مُّضِلٍّ‌ۗ|misleader.|86|103|14987$أَلَيْسَ|Is not|68|85|5522$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|61|123$بِعَزِيزٍ|All-Mighty,|91|299|8704$ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍ|All-Able of retribution?|168|376|14988$

4097.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|56|765$يَـٰقَوْمِ|`O my people!|115|127|513$ٱعْمَلُواْ|Work|85|97|6063$عَلَىٰ|(according) to|115|127|52$مَكَانَتِكُمْ|your position,|110|122|6064$إِنِّى|indeed, I am|102|114|312$عَـٰمِلٌ‌ۖ|working;|76|82|6065$فَسَوْفَ|then soon|86|326|3931$تَعْلَمُونَ|you will know|108|348|212$

4098.verse: مَن|(Upon) whom|108|122|76$يَأْتِيهِ|will come|80|108|8481$عَذَابٌ|a punishment|108|136|72$يُخْزِيهِ|disgracing him|113|141|8482$وَيَحِلُّ|and descends|111|139|8483$عَلَيْهِ|on him|64|78|395$عَذَابٌ|a punishment|108|339|72$مُّقِيمٌ|everlasting.`|105|336|4949$

4090.verse: So who is more unjust than one who lies about Allah and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a residence for the disbelievers?

4091.verse: And the one who has brought the truth and [they who] believed in it - those are the righteous.

4092.verse: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the doers of good -

4093.verse: That Allah may remove from them the worst of what they did and reward them their due for the best of what they used to do.

4094.verse: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant [Prophet Muhammad]? And [yet], they threaten you with those [they worship] other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.

4095.verse: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution?

4096.verse: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "Then have you considered what you invoke besides Allah? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?" Say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; upon Him [alone] rely the [wise] reliers."

4097.verse: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, [for] indeed, I am working; and you are going to know

4098.verse: To whom will come a torment disgracing him and on whom will descend an enduring punishment."
